name: V_EHI_NMM_CASE_MGMT_STATIC
description: This view supports extracting RTF data for EHI from the case management masterfile.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the case record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient linked to the case record.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: ID of the logical deployment owner for this record.  Logical owners show the deployment where the record was created but doesn't represent if the record is a part of version skew.
